reviewText:
I purchased this special because I work with open heart patients. It is a very useful educational device for all of my patients. It is so hard for them to go through this procedure. Life changing. To have so many celebrities discuss it truly helps them to understand that they too can have a full and normal life after going through so much.
I loved the coverage of all the different procedures, CABG and Valves. The humor helps the patietns release fear.
